I have 3 of these shirts and I am getting at 4 more. These shirts are so comfortable and soft. I have had the 1st two shirts for about 2 years now. I have washed them, put them in the dryer, worked out in them and repeated and the colors is still vibrant. That's why I went and got another one. These stretch with me, they don't restrict me. I am 5'3" and 125 pounds, I order Medium size, and it fits just a little loose, nothing too crazy, just a little loose, and I like it that way it makes it comfortable to workout in. (I do full body stretch, cardio, bike, and weight lifting.) If you like working out and want to be comfy... or someone who runs a lot of errands and want to be comfy and cute this is the shirt for you!
The material is so soft and comfortable on. I ordered a L and it fits as expected. It is wrinkled, but other than that, it is a really nice workout top. I would order more colors.

评论概述: Super comfy! But sizing can be a bit off.
评论详情: I tried on the gray one first and it fit like a charm. I am 5'3, 120-125 lbs and bought all three shirts in a size S. The black one felt closer to a XS. I could barely fit my hands through the end of the sleeve hole where the thumb hole opening was. It was very tight. So I'm not sure if the other are normal for a size S or if they were sewn differently than the gray one. The material is super soft and stretchy. Overall I love them. Just a little disappointed in the sizing being a little off between the ones I bought. Hope this helps!

I looked through the reviews to make sure that this would be a good shirt for someone who is plus sized and wanting a little more confidence while working out. The slightly open back was a little higher than I expected but I didn’t mind that so much. I did however, hate how the top half of the shirt fit. The sleeves were far too tight and small (to the point that the material twisted and sat weird on my arms) and the small cuff at the end was too tight. The top of the shirt has the same issues with the material gathering badly around my best and not flowing at all like any of the pictures showed. Really disappointed in this product.
It’s a pretty working out shirt but the front is really flowie not to bad.

I really wanted to like this top. The first thing I noticed was the thumb hole and the sleeve openings were the same size. It was too tight across the palm of my hand. I thought I put my hand through the wrong hole. The fabric is clingy and shows all of your lumps/bumps. The neck doesn't sit as pictured. The collar is more narrow than advertised. The length was also shorter than pictured. I have a long torso so I look for longer workout tops. I loved the color 😬 I ordered other workouts tops in medium and they fit as expected.

评论概述: Flattering and Comfortable - a little short for raised arm postures!
评论详情: I'm 5'4" 118 34D and purchased a size S in white.  The top has a flatering shape and the material is soft and comfortable.  Be sure to wear a white bra - white is somewhat see through. I'm going to order one in a color and see if there are differences.  Wore for a Kundilini Yoga class - the tunic length was not as long as in the ad pic and I am sort waisted.  Would have been 5 stars but the thumb holes pull on those joints if you extend your arms  - thought it was my long arms but I saw the same on the ad model.UPDATE:  Bought this in black size S and the see through, shortness, and tight thumbholes issues I had with the white shirt were gone.  It's adorable, works well for yoga or just stylin.

评论概述: Very cute but the thumb holes are ridiculously small.
评论详情: This shirt is very cute. The fabric is soft and the style is very flattering. However… I returned it because the thumbhole is so small that you can’t push it up over your wrist. It fits fine if you’re going to have the shirt down on your hand, but when you want to push it up and have it look like a regular shirt, the thumbhole is very tight and small. I wear a size small and the size small body fit me perfectly but the thumb hole ruined it.

Color is great (I got the pink) but the material is quite thin and clingy.  The criss-cross in the back didnt fit me like the photo shows. It was not on the waist line, instead it was mid-way up my back. That may what others would want but that's not what the photo showed or what I wanted.

评论概述: Did not get what I ordered
评论详情: I ordered a small light green, a small light blue and a medium navy and I got a small navy sweatshirt instead. These were Christmas presents and now someone won’t get their navy blue medium. I had to order another one hoping that I get what I ordered even though it’s going to be arriving after Christmas. Otherwise, the other two are perfect and I’m very happy with those. I’m sure the product is amazing if I had only been sent the correct one.
